channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SENTRY-1984] Decrease number of max idle connections for Sentry clients
item.description: Sentry by default has a pool of 500 connections and the default for max idle is 400. If we have multiple clients, Sentry may run out of connections, so we need to reduce the default.
item.summary: Decrease number of max idle connections for Sentry clients

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

akolb The patch has run successfully two times in a row. I think we can commit it. Are you ok with it?
Yes, I'm ok committing this one. The change shouldn't cause such test failures.
